data.title: Ljungby, Sweden
data.meta_description: April weather for Ljungby, Sweden: The month with the least rainfall in Ljungby, Sweden, is April, when the rain falls for 11 days and typically collects 15mm (0.59") of precipitation. April is a cool spring month in Ljungby, Sweden, with an average temperature varying between 11.5°C (52.7°F) and 2.6°C (36.7°F).
data.text:
Average high temperature in April: 11.5°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (21.4°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (0.3°C).

Average low temperature in April: 2.6°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (12.2°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (-3°C).

Average humidity in April

Ljungby, Sweden

Average humidity in April: 70%

The months with the highest relative humidity are January, February, November and December (90%).

The months with the lowest relative humidity are April and May (70%).

Average snowfall days in April

Ljungby, Sweden

Average snowfall days in April: 1.8 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (12.3 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August and September (0 days).

Average daylight in April /

Average sunshine in April

Ljungby, Sweden

Average daylight in April: 14h and 2min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 17h and 42min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 6h and 54min).

Average sunshine in April: 8h and 2min

The month with the most sunshine is June (Average sunshine: 9h and 12min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 2h and 36min).

Average cloud cover in April

Ljungby, Sweden

Average cloud cover in April: 45

The months with the most cloud cover are November and December (Cloud cover 74).

The months with the least cloud cover are April and June (Cloud cover 45).

Average visibility in April

Ljungby, Sweden

Average visibility in April: 9km

The months with the highest visibility are April, May, June and July (9km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January and February (7km).
